snippet: The National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences is trying to pull together different constituencies to work for a single, all-purpose bill for fair compensation.
abstract: National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences is trying to pull together different constituencies within music industry to lobby for a single, all-purpose bill for fair compensation; group's president Neil Portnow will speak at Washington dinner attended by some of Capitol Hill's most powerful lawmakers.
lead_paragraph: The National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences is trying to pull together different constituencies to work for a single, all-purpose bill for fair compensation.

headline.main: Music Industry Pushes Unified Message on Compensation
headline.print_headline: A Fractious Music Industry Lobby Looks to Strike a Note of Accord

keywords.value: National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences
keywords.name: organizations
